name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 2, the U.S. Department of Homeland Security said that the United States used a charter flight for the first time last weekend to repatriate Chinese who entered the country illegally.
DHS did not say how many people were on the charter flight, how long they were stranded in the United States, where the charter flight flew to in China, or who paid for the charter flight.
Reuters quoted a statement from the Department of Homeland Security saying that the United States and China are cooperating to reduce illegal immigration and combat human smuggling

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, "US military steals wheat from Syria" has once again become a hot search
However, some netizens have discovered that this is the fourth consecutive year that domestic media has reported the "US military steals wheat" incident, and they have used the same footage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/QaW7CeWLF2

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, it was reported online that Shanghai temporarily borrowed 10 billion yuan in incense money from temples in its jurisdiction as short-term working capital debt, and Jing'an Temple contributed 4.8 billion yuan.
On July 2, relevant departments in Shanghai refuted the rumor, saying that the rumor was untrue, and that Shanghai's fiscal operations were generally healthy, and the specific figures would be announced in mid-July.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of July 1, Chongyang County, Xianning City, Hubei Province. 
Floodwaters rushed into the underground garage.

content:
The finances are so tight now, why don't you reduce your own burden?
Netizen comment: Will you revolutionize yourself?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 1, the Shanxi Provincial Medical Insurance Center issued a notice that starting from July 5, except for public medical institutions above the first level, township health centers, and community health service centers, other medical institutions will suspend the use of the pooling fund to pay for outpatient consultation fees. The reason is to combat medical insurance fraud.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 2, some Hong Kong citizens went to the entrance of the Japanese Consulate General in Hong Kong to lay flowers in memory of Hu Youping.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 2, someone jumped off a building in Shenzhen Kexing Science Park.
Then the property staff rushed over immediately and held up a sign saying it was a "safety drill."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 1, Pingjiang, Hunan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 2, Shanghai. A man smashed a gold jewelry counter with a hammer in broad daylight and was quickly controlled and pinned to the ground by security guards. The police reported: Wang was confused and incoherent.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is said that China Resources Bank breached the contract and made the fresh graduate pay 10,000 yuan
Recently, some netizens revealed that China Resources Bank HR promised the client to return to the head office for rotation after three months in the branch, and finally directly assigned to the head office; after that, HR temporarily changed the plan, requiring two years of grassroots front desk rotation, and could not guarantee a permanent position in the head office. It also stated that if the client did not accept the new plan, the client could only choose to terminate the contract and pay a penalty of 10,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 3, Changde, Hunan. It was reported online that a family of four was killed in Nanzhupu Village, Taoyuan County. A cordon was set up around the scene and police were on the scene.
According to local netizens: The incident happened at around 5 a.m. and the motive was suspected to be related to a land dispute.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The netizen replied: I have a boss who owes me 10,000 yuan. If life gets hard one day, I will commit murder.
Another netizen replied: I have endured it for four years. My boss owes me hard-earned money for four years and won't pay me. I may not be able to bear it one day and do something extreme like this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 3 (Released) Luoyang, Henan. Netizens filmed the city management law enforcement on the roadside, and then a man came up to question: Who told you to record it? Not only that, the man also littered and said "I can do whatever I want." Afterwards, the local city management bureau responded: He is a formal employee, but he was not at work that day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 3, it was reported online that an employee of CICC jumped off a building due to excessive pressure from mortgage loans caused by salary cuts by the company.
CICC responded: Deep condolences and a special task force has been set up.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
I was looking for a job on BOSS Zhipin and found a job for writing political articles. I have to sigh that writing brainwashing political articles is really cheap inside the wall. Original 2000 words for 20 yuan (excluding punctuation marks), patchwork 2000 words for 6 yuan (excluding punctuation marks)

content: On July 2, a police car caught fire in Guangdong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 3, the town of Jiangzhou in Jiujiang, Jiangxi Province, issued a "letter home" calling on fellow villagers to return home to fight the flood. This triggered ridicule from netizens.
Netizen: After reading the comments, I found that people's hearts were scattered.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Baotou Municipal Government released the average wage data for 2023, showing that the average wage of employees in non-private units was twice that of employees in private units.
